description:
After rescuing Kazuma and the others, Pierrot leads everyone to an underground lake. He promises everyone that he’ll swim outside and find help, but there’s one problem... he can’t swim! Can Pierrot get out of it, or did he bite off more than he could chew?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Grosse erreur de Pierrot ! Comment est le dernier dîner ?
Piero Dai Gosan!! Saigo no Bansan, Oaji wa Ikaga?
Pierrot Makes a Huge Mistake! How Does the Last Supper Taste?
เปียโร่คำนวณพลาดมหันต์!! อาหารค่ำมื้อสุดท้าย รสชาติเป็นไงบ้าง?
ピエロ大誤算!! 最後の晩餐, お味はいかが?
